svg.text: In the floating city of Vrenphoria, there lived a brilliant architect named Klythar Pindlebaum. Klythar was tasked with designing the world’s first building made entirely of light.
Using his knowledge of ancient and futuristic technologies, he created a structure that was both magnificent and invisible, standing as a testament to the harmony between nature and technology.
But as he finished the final piece of his masterpiece, Klythar realized that something was amiss—the building began to flicker and fade.
